definition: Su Tseng-chang (1947-), Taiwanese DPP politician, premier of the Republic of China (2019-)

surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州

sentences.english: Su recently unveiled his plans for an urban development policy for the capitol.
sentences.chinese: 蘇貞昌最近透露了他對首都發展的計畫藍圖。

sentences.english: Mr Su is unlikely to win in Taipei, a KMT stronghold.
sentences.chinese: 蘇貞昌不會再國民黨的大本營臺北勝選。
